Class BigNum

  • java.lang.Object
    • BigNum

  • public class BigNum
extends Object
    BigNum class enables the creation of large numbers inside an array as all the numbers have the same size and base being independant of the size of the number.
    Version:
    1.0 21/12/16
    Author:
    Bartu Atabek
